This is an example of an automated report.



## Survey Data


```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(psych)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/survey_responses.csv")
```

```{r}
data <- data |> select(-1, -Timestamp)

psych::describe(data) |>
    select(-vars) |> 
    knitr::kable()


data |> gather() |> 
   ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
    geom_density() +
    facet_wrap(~key, ncol = 5) +
    labs(
        title = "Distribution of Each Question in the System Usability Scale",
        x = NULL, y = NULL,
        subtitle = "X axis values are from 1 to 5"
    ) +
    theme(
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank()
    )
```
